usa: Democrat Nancy Pelosi became the first woman to become Speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives.<sup id="cite_ref-26" class="reference">[26]</sup>
Iraq War troop surge of 2007: George W. Bush ordered the substantial increase of the number of United States troops in Iraq.[27]
Virginia Tech massacre: A South Korean student shot and killed thirty-two other students and professors before killing himself.[28]
The I-35W Mississippi River bridge in Minneapolis, Minnesota collapsed, killing thirteen people.<sup id="cite_ref-29" class="reference">[29]</sup>
Late-2000s recession: A recession began.[30][31][32]
